segments.text: I notice the kitchen's layout with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, unnoticed by her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to something by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting with open palm nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are spread unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widening on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a calm garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back let in the daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled neatly to the side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into quite the mishap soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar label stands out clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR
